s.text: I'll tell you more about how to use the Navigation Banner in just a minute.
"In Other Magazines" sizes up the Time , Newsweek , and other major periodicals--usually before they hit your mailbox or local newsstand.
(Remember you must have Internet Explorer 4.0 or better or the forthcoming Netscape Navigator for this function to work.)

We also chart the critical consensus about books, movies, art, and music in "Summary Judgment" and spare you from having to watch the Sunday talk shows by offering you the gist in "Pundit Central" (check in Sunday evening to prepare for Monday sessions at the water cooler).
